description.zh-cn: 新加坡的执政党，自1959年新加坡自治以来一直掌权。该党由李光耀等人于1954年创立，奉行保守主义、经济自由主义和实用主义等意识形态。
description.en: The ruling political party of Singapore, in power since the country's self-governance in 1959. Founded in 1954 by Lee Kuan Yew and others, the party adheres to ideologies such as conservatism, economic liberalism, and pragmatism.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党的创始成员和首任秘书长，曾于1959年至1990年担任新加坡总理。
description.en: Singaporean politician, a founding member and the first Secretary-General of the People's Action Party, who served as the Prime Minister of Singapore from 1959 to 1990.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党的创始成员之一。
description.en: Singaporean politician, one of the founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党的创始成员之一。
description.en: Singaporean politician, one of the founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党的创始成员之一。
description.en: Singaporean politician, one of the founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党的创始成员和首任主席。
description.en: Singaporean politician, a founding member and the first Chairman of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡和马来西亚政治家，人民行动党的创始成员之一，后将马来西亚的人民行动党改组为民主行动党。
description.en: Singaporean and Malaysian politician, a founding member of the People's Action Party, who later reorganized the Malaysian branch of PAP into the Democratic Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党的创始成员和第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Singaporean politician, a founding member and one of the first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党的创始成员和第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Singaporean politician, a founding member and one of the first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党的创始成员和第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Singaporean politician, a founding member and one of the first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党的创始成员和第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Singaporean politician, a founding member and one of the first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党的创始成员之一。
description.en: Singaporean politician, one of the founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Singaporean politician, one of the first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，人民行动党第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Singaporean politician, one of the first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，现任新加坡总理及人民行动党秘书长。
description.en: Singaporean politician, the current Prime Minister of Singapore and Secretary-General of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，现任人民行动党主席及新加坡教育部部长。
description.en: Singaporean politician, the current Chairman of the People's Action Party and Minister for Education of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，现任人民行动党副主席。
description.en: Singaporean politician, the current Vice Chairman of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，现任人民行动党助理秘书长。
description.en: Singaporean politician, the current Assistant Secretary-General of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 一个由世界各国社会党、社会民主党和工党组成的国际政党组织。人民行动党曾是其成员，后于1976年被驱逐。
description.en: An international organization of social democratic, socialist, and labour parties from around the world. The People's Action Party was a member until its expulsion in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚的岛屿城邦国家。1963年至1965年曾是马来西亚的一个州。
description.en: An island city-state in Southeast Asia. It was a state of Malaysia from 1963 to 1965.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚国家，实行联邦制。新加坡曾于1963年至1965年加入该联邦。
description.en: A country in Southeast Asia with a federal system. Singapore joined the federation from 1963 to 1965.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的主要政党之一，长期主张“马来人优先”政策，曾与人民行动党在政治上对立。
description.en: One of Malaysia's major political parties, which has long advocated a "Malay pre-eminence" policy and was a political opponent of the People's Action Party.

zh-cn: 新加坡退出马来西亚联邦

description.zh-cn: 1965年8月9日，新加坡因政治分歧退出马来西亚联邦，成为独立共和国。
description.en: On August 9, 1965, Singapore separated from the Federation of Malaysia due to political differences and became an independent republic.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政党，由蒂凡那于1966年将原人民行动党在马来西亚的组织改组而成。
description.en: A Malaysian political party formed in 1966 by C. V. Devan Nair through the reorganization of the former Malaysian branch of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾活跃于马来半岛的共产主义政党，被新加坡人民行动党和马来西亚政府视为威胁并加以清剿。
description.en: A communist party formerly active on the Malay Peninsula, which was considered a threat and suppressed by both the People's Action Party of Singapore and the Malaysian government.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的政府首脑。人民行动党历任秘书长均担任此职务。
description.en: The head of government of Singapore. The Secretaries-General of the People's Action Party have concurrently held this position.

description.zh-cn: 英国的主要政党之一。1976年，该党动议将人民行动党逐出社会党国际。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the United Kingdom. In 1976, the party initiated a motion to expel the People's Action Party from the Socialist International.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰的社会民主主义政党。1976年，该党动议将人民行动党逐出社会党国际。
description.en: A social-democratic political party in the Netherlands. In 1976, the party initiated a motion to expel the People's Action Party from the Socialist International.

description.zh-cn: 前人民行动党国会议员，因失信罪于1979年被新加坡贪污调查局调查后弃保潜逃，35年后自首并被判刑。
description.en: A former Member of Parliament for the People's Action Party, who was investigated by the Corrupt Practices Investigation Bureau for criminal breach of trust in 1979, subsequently absconded, and surrendered 35 years later to be sentenced.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政府的独立反贪机构，负责调查和预防腐败行为。
description.en: An independent anti-corruption agency of the Singapore Government responsible for investigating and preventing corruption.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，曾于1981年至1993年担任人民行动党主席。
description.en: Singaporean politician who served as the Chairman of the People's Action Party from 1981 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，曾于1993年至2004年担任人民行动党主席。
description.en: Singaporean politician who served as the Chairman of the People's Action Party from 1993 to 2004.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，曾于2004年至2011年担任人民行动党主席。
description.en: Singaporean politician who served as the Chairman of the People's Action Party from 2004 to 2011.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，曾于2011年至2018年担任人民行动党主席。
description.en: Singaporean politician who served as the Chairman of the People's Action Party from 2011 to 2018.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，曾于2018年至2022年担任人民行动党主席。
description.en: Singaporean politician who served as the Chairman of the People's Action Party from 2018 to 2022.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，曾于2022年至2025年担任人民行动党主席。
description.en: Singaporean politician who served as the Chairman of the People's Action Party from 2022 to 2025.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，曾于1957年短暂担任人民行动党秘书长。
description.en: Singaporean politician who briefly served as the Secretary-General of the People's Action Party in 1957.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，曾于1992年至2004年担任人民行动党秘书长。
description.en: Singaporean politician who served as the Secretary-General of the People's Action Party from 1992 to 2004.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，曾于2004年至2024年担任人民行动党秘书长。
description.en: Singaporean politician who served as the Secretary-General of the People's Action Party from 2004 to 2024.

description.zh-cn: 人民行动党的青年组织。
description.en: The youth wing of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 负责管理新加坡教育体系的政府部门。
description.en: The government ministry responsible for the management of Singapore's education system.

description.zh-cn: 李光耀是人民行动党的主要创始成员之一。
description.en: Lee Kuan Yew was one of the main founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 林清祥是人民行动党的创始成员之一。
description.en: Lim Chin Siong was one of the founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 拉惹勒南是人民行动党的创始成员之一。
description.en: S. Rajaratnam was one of the founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 吴庆瑞是人民行动党的创始成员之一。
description.en: Goh Keng Swee was one of the founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 杜进才是人民行动党的创始成员之一。
description.en: Toh Chin Chye was one of the founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 蒂凡那是人民行动党的创始成员之一。
description.en: C. V. Devan Nair was one of the founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 方水双是人民行动党的创始成员和第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Fong Swee Suan was one of the founding members and first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯迈拉欣是人民行动党的创始成员和第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Ismail Rahim was one of the founding members and first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾超卓是人民行动党的创始成员和第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Chan Chiaw Thor was one of the founding members and first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 李玉成是人民行动党的创始成员和第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Lee Gek Seng was one of the founding members and first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 陈维经是人民行动党的创始成员之一。
description.en: Tan Wee Keng was one of the founding members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 王永元是人民行动党第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Ong Eng Guan was one of the first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 陈维今是人民行动党第一届中央委员之一。
description.en: Tan Wee Keng was one of the first Central Executive Committee members of the People's Action Party.

position.zh-cn: 中央执行委员会秘书长
position.en: Secretary-General of the Central Executive Committee

position.en: Secretary-General of the Central Executive Committee

position.zh-cn: 中央执行委员会秘书长
position.en: Secretary-General of the Central Executive Committee

position.zh-cn: 中央执行委员会秘书长
position.en: Secretary-General of the Central Executive Committee

position.zh-cn: 中央执行委员会秘书长
position.en: Secretary-General of the Central Executive Committee

description.zh-cn: 人民行动党青年团是人民行动党的青年组织。
description.en: The Young PAP is the youth wing of the People's Action Party.

description.zh-cn: 人民行动党自成立起即为社会党国际成员，直至1976年被开除。
description.en: The People's Action Party was a member of the Socialist International from its founding until its expulsion in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 在英国工党和荷兰工党的动议下，社会党国际于1976年将人民行动党开除，原因是不认同其高压统治方式和右倾政策。
description.en: At the initiative of the British Labour Party and the Dutch Labour Party, the Socialist International expelled the People's Action Party in 1976 due to disagreement with its authoritarian rule and right-leaning policies.

description.zh-cn: 在1963至1965年间，新加坡作为马来西亚联邦的一个州，受其管辖。
description.en: Between 1963 and 1965, Singapore was a state within the Federation of Malaysia and was under its jurisdiction.

description.zh-cn: 由于双方在政治上无法达成妥协，马来西亚中央政府决定促使新加坡退出联邦，导致新加坡独立。
description.en: Due to the inability to reach a political compromise, the central government of Malaysia decided to have Singapore withdraw from the federation, leading to Singapore's independence.

description.zh-cn: 在新加坡属于马来西亚期间，人民行动党因反对“马来人优先”政策而与主张该政策的巫统产生严重政治对立。
description.en: While Singapore was part of Malaysia, the People's Action Party was in severe political opposition to UMNO due to its objection to the "Malay pre-eminence" policy advocated by UMNO.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡独立后，蒂凡那于1966年3月18日将原人民行动党在马来西亚的组织改组为民主行动党。
description.en: After Singapore's independence, C. V. Devan Nair reorganized the former Malaysian branch of the People's Action Party into the Democratic Action Party on March 18, 1966.

description.zh-cn: 人民行动党在新加坡独立后实行强烈的反共政策，并与马来西亚合作清剿马来亚共产党。
description.en: After Singapore's independence, the People's Action Party implemented a strong anti-communist policy and cooperated with Malaysia to suppress the Malayan Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1979年，新加坡贪污调查局因彭由国涉嫌失信与挪用公款而对其展开调查，导致其被控上法庭。
description.en: In 1979, the Corrupt Practices Investigation Bureau investigated Phey Yew Kok for alleged criminal breach of trust and misappropriation of funds, leading to his prosecution in court.
